p: The following reagents and chemicals were used in this study: polyphenols, 1,8-cineole, and anhydrous sodium sulfate from Sigma-Aldrich; Nutritional Agar (NA); Sabouraud Dextrose Agar with chloramphenicol (SDA); Műller-Hinton Broth (MHB); Sabouraud Dextrose Broth (SDB); ciprofloxacin (CPH 5 μg/disc); fluconazole (FLC 25 μg/disc).
